content.question: Which of the following processes is best represented by Figure 1 ?

choices.label: Cell signaling to increase gene expression
Translation of an mRNA to produce a protein
Regulation of gene expression by <math alttext="micro R N A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>microRNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
